Query limits Hourly: %1/%2 Daily: %1/%2 This display tracks the number of queued requests to %1 and the remaining daily and hourly requests. The %1 API limits you to a pool of requests per day and requests per hour. It is dynamically updated every time a request is completed. If you run out of requests, you will be unable to queue downloads, check updates, query mod info and so on. Both pools must be consumed before this happens. Query limit to %1 has been reached for a period of time
